name: Unity DOTS Honors
description:
This build is a tech demo which includes 2000 ships with waypoint & firing logic. These entities employ the use of Unity DOTS/ECS.

The ships will fire upon a planet when they are close to it and will retreat away from the planet before they get too close.

The user can navigate around the scene using WASD (Left, Right etc.) and the mouse to pan the camera.

Performance can be measured at the top right of the screen using the FPS/performance graphs provided.
